title: When you suggest an item to an ally and they response with "F*** YOU!"
body:
http://www.quickmeme.com/img/25/25314e8871656c5afc1cea6ef6487b4976f23bdf7130c1213f0e71aa8e1ee1ac.jpg


And then when they say what they are doing fine when they are 0/5:

http://4.images.southparkstudios.com/blogs/southparkstudios.com/files/2014/03/1205-score-jefe.jpg?quality=0.8

replies.body:
The enemy was full AD, and I told our Galio to build thornmail.

He tried to optimize using Galio's passive...with magic resist.
Why would anyone pick a galio into a full ad team?

> [{quoted}](name=AlphaKiloGaming,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kdN9NMEI,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-15T19:39:38.208+0000)
>
> Why would anyone pick a galio into a full ad team?

Galios actually pretty damn good against a full AD team if he builds thornmail.

> [{quoted}](name=Nasreth,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kdN9NMEI,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-05-15T19:42:56.608+0000)
>
> Galios actually pretty damn good against a full AD team if he builds thornmail.

I love thornmail on Galio, the ult does so much unexpected damage
thornmail sunfire + galio ult has a lot of surprise butsecks damage
It's not rape if you yell "Suprise!"
This made my day although it is awful.

Galio is great against AD

I wish people would wisen up and understand this
blind pick?
Read as: "you'd have to be an idiot to play anything other than ranked/draft."
First pick?
Yep..those kinds of Keedz.

question:
would you rather have;
Jax 200 farm 0/5
or
jax 40 farm 5/0
?

To many unknown variables.

Who is he facing? 

Who did those 5 death go to on the enemy team? 

What items did they buy because of it? 

What did Jax buy in both cases? 

How many of those 200 or 40 farms are caster minons, melee minions, or Cannon Minions?
Same builds, the only difference is that the 0/5 jax is significantly farther ahead due to the farm. the reason he died was because of 2-3 man ganks TF mid.

People shouldn't be building him full magic resist against an AP heavy team let alone an AD team, it allows you to get early MR to get an edge over magic damage lanes, after that you get either AP or magic pen to take advantage of his high base damages. He might actually be the best thornmail user in the game thanks to his ult and W, he heals as you take damage from hitting him, and he can force everyone to hit him while taking 50% damage.

{{champion:103}}: Hey Leona, can you get a locket -- they have a lot of AP damage!

{{champion:89}}: FUCK YOU, DO YOU THINK I'M MADE OF GOLD?!

{{champion:103}}: Oh ok, sorry!

*10 minutes later*

{{champion:89}} has purchased {{item:3083}}.

> [{quoted}](name=iainB85,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kdN9NMEI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-15T19:01:37.872+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}}: Hey Leona, can you get a locket -- they have a lot of AP damage!
> 
> {{champion:89}}: FUCK YOU, DO YOU THINK I'M MADE OF GOLD?!
> 
> {{champion:103}}: Oh ok, sorry!
> 
> *10 minutes later*
> 
> {{champion:89}} has purchased {{item:3083}}.

guessing personal story because its a ahri
eww that leona...I'm so srry that you had to deal with someone building selfishly. As a support main this also makes me slightly sad.
Building selfishly doesn't really make sense as support. I think the word, optimally, would fit better.
That isn't building selfish...that is building dumb as fuck.
I use the term selfish meaning to build for oneself. She isn't building to benefit the team as a support should, but to make sure SHE lives. Typically selfish builds tend to be dumb as well.

I'm sorry on behalf of all Leona mains

I'd probably build the same way, but I wouldn't reject the suggestion like that.
My strategy is to suggest good items to enemy players because they never build them; solely out of spite.
You'd think {{item:3155}} in the situations where you build one wouldn't be such a hard concept for some people, but sadly...
I've played against Zeds that don't build a Hexdrinker against Veigar. Its horrible.

{{champion:238}} Me build defensively? BS. I don't need to. Now watch me tower dive this nub.

*Patch notes: ult now has a 1 second cooldown before recast.*

{{champion:82}} An ally has been slain. {{champion:238}} 

{{champion:238}} . . .

{{champion:82}} heu heu heu.

{{champion:82}} Ty for the ghost. I will have it destroy your turret. 

{{champion:238}} Don't do that. 

{{champion:82}} I'm going to do it. 

{{champion:238}} Don't do it. 

{{champion:82}} I'm doing it. 

_Your turret has been destroyed_

{{champion:238}} ......

{{champion:82}} heu heu heu.

Meh but zed doesn't build AP so vegan ult does like nothing... bronze boobs


//sarcasm xD

That is my go to MR item on shaco.  I normally go with AP or cdr glyphs so that extra MR and magic shIeld have saved me so many times.
it also procs on your clone and helps for better jukes :D

I had an ap corki on an all ap... then I called him on it and he mentioned he had more kills... I was a tank support...
ladies and gentlemen! I give you the 9th wonder of the world: a man living without a brain
Had an enemy Xin go AP on a team that was already almost entirely AP, made my job as the tank pretty easy

What gif do you use when it's the other way around? I've def had people tell me to build something and been like, oh yeah, that. Good call, glad you saw that.

However, also had people be like wtf are you building, onlybuildonebuildprox.com says to build needless into zhonyas on Heimer, why are you building morello's? Uh bc it's 1k cheaper to a finished item, give me mana regen to spam rockets in lane, and give me the 20% cdr to keep turrets up and regen them faster which is why I just rotated to your lane and took the enemy tower so you can top trying to dive them and giving up free kills! lol only partially salty right? :D
My friend says this all the time in solo queue lol.

Says what? 

"F*** You?" or "How do I reach these Keedz?"

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kdN9NMEI,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-05-16T01:51:58.254+0000)
>
> Says what? 
> 
> "F*** You?" or "How do I reach these Keedz?"

"How do I reach these keedz?"
Ahh...ok then.

Honestly, most of the time I tend to build whatever I feel I need at that moment, I have no set builds. I love when my teammates suggest items for me. But not just suggest these items, but tell me why they're suggesting them.
Exactly. When they tell you the reason why it really helps.
The keedz are just bad
Lol, too true!

Casual people I play with ~

{{champion:34}} Why should I play AP Anivia...

***30 minutes later***

{{champion:34}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3181}} {{item:3181}} {{item:3181}} **WHEN I CAN BASIC ATTACK AND GET FULL HEALTH**

{{champion:114}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:245}} **WHAT THE F*CK ARE YOU BUILDING**
I thought you were supposed to say F*** YOU to your teammates when they say anything to you at all.
I don't when they say nice job.
With your permission I'm gonna steal the second image for another meme related to this one :)
Sure. Go right ahead.
More like asking your teammates to upgrade  their trinkets
They usually do when I ask....about 70% of the time.

I don't bother suggesting anything to anyone.
You only make the whiney bitch tilt.
So I just focus on myself and ignore any and all interaction with players outside of telling my team flash timers etc and saying I'm going to X with X or gank X...etc

{{champion:84}} Hey Vayne you should buy a BORK
